title: Toni's Fully Furnished Pizza Co
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. All pizza bases are vegan; also has rye and gluten free bases. Any non-vegan toppings are easily swapped for any veggie toppings of the same value from the toppings menu. As of May 2016, does not offer vegan cheese or meat substitutes. Vegan pasta choices, as well as zucchini pasta, are offered.
